function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of misinformation on social media","Impact":"Increased confusion, distrust, and potential harm to individuals and society","Mitigation":"Promoting media literacy and critical thinking, fact-checking, and combating algorithm manipulation","Technologies":"AI-driven content analysis, fact-checking tools, algorithmic transparency","People":"General public, vulnerable populations, political and scientific communities","Owner":"Social media platforms, fact-checking organizations, government regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Use of bot armies to manipulate platform algorithms","Impact":"Artificial boosting of fake news visibility, manipulation of public opinion","Mitigation":"Developing AI-based bot detection, algorithm transparency, and platform regulation","Technologies":"Bot detection algorithms, platform monitoring tools","People":"Social media users, general public, political organizations","Owner":"Social media platforms, regulatory authorities, cybersecurity organizations"},{"Description":"Confirmation bias and echo-chambers","Impact":"Reinforcement of existing beliefs, limited exposure to diverse perspectives, polarization of society","Mitigation":"Diverse content exposure, critical thinking education, and algorithmic diversification","Technologies":"Algorithmic diversification tools, educational platforms, diversity tracking algorithms","People":"Social media users, general public, ideological groups","Owner":"Educational institutions, social media platforms, content creators"}]}
